lead_paragraph: Sweet Home Café’s mission is a tricky one: educate and nourish visitors to the new National Museum of African American History and Culture.

headline.main: Museum Cafeteria Serves Black History and a Bit of Comfort

snippet: Sweet Home Café’s mission is a tricky one: educate and nourish visitors to the new National Museum of African American History and Culture....
abstract: Sweet Home Cafe inside National Museum of African American History and Culture in Washington, DC, serves food that reflects African-American culture.
